title: New & MPfree: Lianne La Havas – Lost and Found (Slime Remix)
content:
I feel pretty smug whenever I hear a new cut from Slime. Mostly because I’ve always heard them at least a few months before they drop, but secondly because I love Will Archer more than he’ll ever know.

OMG babe, if you’re reading this hit me up, we haven’t jammed in AGES.

Anyway, he’s only gone and remixed a track from mega sensation Lianne La Havas. It’s just what you’d expect from Slime, masterfully soulful, serene and bitterly somber, yet hopeful of what’s to come.

Hit play… Via NTS
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
